item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. De Beers amasses biggest diamond stockpile since 2008 financial crisis
2. Defaults on leveraged loans soar to highest rate in 4 years
3. Chess champion Magnus Carlsen leads gambit to capture ancient game
4. China steps up campaign for single people to date, marry and give birth
5. Fine wine market in the red as Chinese demand dries up
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
